thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com | 4 of 65
thread.title: Peter
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text:
Professional service with polite an efficient agent Karen Lane.
I received excellent service, especially whilst I had a few changes happening, Karen and her staff were empathetic, polite and patient.
Karen searched and confirmed cheap business class and first class flights with minimum airport transition.
I have booked twice now through Karen and I have recommended her and Alpha Guru's service to others.
Thanks for a pleasant experience.
